Class Player

java.lang.Object
Player
public class Player extends Object
A class the represents a player in the game.

May 23, 2022
Author:
Ritam Chakraborty

    • addCard

      public boolean addCard​(Card newCard, Card lastCard)
      Adds a specified new card to the hand of the player if there are no cards the player can play on top of the last card played
      Parameters:
      newCard - new card to add to hand
      lastCard - last card that was played
      Returns:
      true if card was added, false if not
